pageContent:
CARLOS ALBERTO LOPES CORDOVIL 
Long Beach, California | (562) 212-0707 | calcrj@hotmail.com  
 
36 years of experience in IT support and Software Development using MUMPS, Cache ObjectScript and PYTHON, making 
systems for cash flow, accounts payable/ receivable, asset control, fleet control and others. 
 
Profile dynamic, flexible, creative and organized. Great practical and realistic sense. Adaptability and capacity for 
innovation, good communication and consensus. Focus on planning to get the best results and achieve the goals. 
  
WORK EXPERIENCE 
Riverstreamz                                                                                                                                                       January 2024 - Present 
IT Support  
 
● Support for Presidential Bid Election LA County.  
● Router testing and configuration. 
● iPad testing and configuration. 
● Testing and measuring the chip signal from mobile phone operators. 
● Support to users via call center.

● Router testing and configuration. 
● iPad testing and configuration. 
● Testing and measuring the chip signal from mobile phone operators. 
● Support to users via call center. 
 
 
Senior Developer                                                                                                                                                  July 2018 - Present 
Freelancer  
 
● Create custom software solutions for helping clients to achieve their goals. 
● Remote support to help resolve problems with MS-Office and Windows. 
● Remote support to help resolve problems with Android. 
● Helping to implement multi-variant testing for new website using PYTHOM+ SELENIUM. 
● Configuration and installation of networks, routers, PCs and other equipment to work in the same domain and IP 
range. 
 
 
softB Sistemas (Brazil)                                                                                                                               January 2009 - June 2018 
Senior Developer

softB Sistemas (Brazil)                                                                                                                               January 2009 - June 2018 
Senior Developer 
 
● Create innovative software for big companies as Brazilian National Water Agency (ANA) and Rio's Urban clean 
company (COMLURB). 
● Developed system to import information about tides in a range of 100 years from ORACLE Database to MUMPS 
database and consolidate it to show different results in reports or EXCEL sheets and charts. 
● After implementing the new software for ANA, they noticed a significant reduction in the time to obtain results, 
from 18 minutes to less than 1 minute on average. This caused energy savings and no more overtime payments, 
resulting in more money saved. 
● At COMLURB we created a new asset and inventory controller that was installed in 7 facilities owned by COMLURB

resulting in more money saved. 
● At COMLURB we created a new asset and inventory controller that was installed in 7 facilities owned by COMLURB 
in the State of Rio de Janeiro. The system was able to check the entry and exit of more than 15k items spread across 
the warehouses and control a fleet of 120 cleaning vehicles, ensuring agility and speed in responses. All information 
between facilities was change using VPN over Internet. 
● After full implementation, the system helped COMLURB to cut 2k items. More efficient, less losses, more money 
saved.

Idéia & Solução  (Brazil)                                                                                                                September 1992 – October 2008 
Senior Developer 
 
● Making the right code to help companies like GERDAU and Duty-Free Shopping achieve their goals. 
● At GERDAU I created a program to translate 4 thousand programs from the old MUMPS Biodata to the new MUMPS 
Meditata. I had a 1 week window to make everything from scratch. I flew from Rio to Porto Alegre on Monday, started 
programming the program, did several tests and on Friday everything was ready. They tested the new system on the 
new MUMPS over the weekend and deployed it on Monday. After starting the new system, they saved hours of work, 
energy and nothing more than overtime. They gained 32% of efficiency from the older to the new one system. 
● Duty-free shopping asked for a system to help control the trips of the coworkers, like tickets, hotel booking, cab and

● Duty-free shopping asked for a system to help control the trips of the coworkers, like tickets, hotel booking, cab and 
tips. We presented a system that did everything they wanted and changed information with Amadeus. 
● We made the word processor EDITUS for MUMPS, that had more than 300 copies sold and helped many companies 
in Brazil to automate their reports, letters, leaflets and manuals. As multi-user, it can be used over the network with 
multiple users simultaneously.  
 
Medidata (Brazil)                                                                                                                                       January 1989 – June 1992 
Sales Engineer  
 
● Provided pre-sales and post-sales support for software and hardware. I also gave lectures on how to use the 
InterSystems MUMPS Open/M (actual IRIS) database on the UNIX system and showed how to use it on Mediata 
computer.

InterSystems MUMPS Open/M (actual IRIS) database on the UNIX system and showed how to use it on Mediata 
computer. 
● Help the customer choose the best option for implementing computer and software resources. 
● Support Marketing Managers with initiatives and campaigns across channels from ideation to execution. 
 
 
SKILLS & PROGRAMS 
 
Skills: MUMPS, CACHE ObjectScript, PYTHON, HTML, CSS, VBSCRIPT, SQL, SQL 
 
Programs: VS-CODE, PYCharm, MS-Office, Windows, Android, Google Suite,GitHub, MSM-Worksation, CACHE, MSM, 
Datatree Mumps. 
 
EDUCATION 
 
Faculdades Reunidas Nuno Lisboa – Brasil                                                  December 1986 
Bachelor in systems analysis 
 
EXTRA COURSES 
 
Universidade Federal Fluminense (UFF) - Management in Computing      -                  August 1992 
Universidade Campinas (UCAM)              - Novel Network Environment     -                   March 1993

Universidade Campinas (UCAM)              - Novel Network Environment     -                   March 1993 
Fundação Getúlio Vargas (FGV)                - Management and Leadership  -                    March 2015 
Google                                                           - Professional IT Support              -                                Jun 2020 
Coursera                                                       - Data Science Orientation           -              October 2020
